title: You fools, this is the real evelynn

replies.body: Imagine having a career and life that people would kill for and fucking it up.
That imagination is this guy's reality

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8Nn2V98e,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-05-21T03:35:46.096+0000)
>
> That imagination is this guy's reality

Your wife is hot, you have fans across the planet, LITERALLY millions of people look forward to you just posting, you have amazing people all around you, and then you cheat on said hot wife then shoot yourself in the foot with a nonapology, like idk man.
wait he shot himself in the foot?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8Nn2V98e,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-21T20:47:09.061+0000)
>
> wait he shot himself in the foot?

Probably.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8Nn2V98e,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-21T20:47:09.061+0000)
>
> wait he shot himself in the foot?

(I'm assuming this is a woosh on my part, but just in case)

 It's an expression, it means everything he did he brought on himself, he ruined his own career
Thank god Jontron on the other hand didn't mess up as bad as Projared, people still like Jontron a lot.
Is that from the cat Mario video? He's funny.
